attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for a politician to lie.
attributes.additional_details: the government employees are civil servants to the public but have seemed to forget this.
attributes.background: Make what i have said law and punishable with a custodial sentence and a life time ban from politics

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 

Require MPs proven to mislead public to resign and create 'fact check' committee 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700161

Introduce a duty of candour to all MPs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700384
